text: Anubhav Patnaik (born 1980) is an Indian politician. He was the sitting MLA from Khandapada constituency for the state assembly of Odisha. He is the son of late Arun Kumar Patnaik, an erstwhile MLA of the state assembly. Currently, he is appointed as one of the four advisors to Biju Yuva Janata Dal, the youth wing of Biju Janata Dal.http://www.newindianexpress.com/states/odisha/2017/apr/14/odisha-cm-and- party-supremo-naveen-patnaik-revamps-youth-and-student-wings-of- bjd-1593687.html ==Outreach== He has been invited by NASSCOM to share his experience as an MLA in areas of agriculture and digital technology.https://community.nasscom.in/events/1302 He has been invited by Tata Trusts to its School and Community Science Programmehttp://www.tatatrusts.org/article/inside/Students-in-remote-South- Odisha-villages-learn-scientific-concepts-in-stimulating-environment He serves as a member of the board of governors at Xavier University Bhubaneswar,https://www.xub.edu.in/about-us/board-of-governer-xub.html IIIT Bhubaneswarhttps://www.iiit-bh.ac.in/home/bog and a member of Odisha State Housing Board.http://oshb.org/board-members/ ==Child-Friendly Constituency== Patnaik has taken lead in making his constituency Khandapada, the first Child- Friendly Constituency (CFC) in Odisha.First ever ‘Child Friendly Constituency’ initiative launched in Odisha http://unicef.in/PressReleases/409/First-ever- Child-Friendly-Constituency-initiative-launched-in- Odishahttp://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-otherstates/Odisha- MLAs-to-make-their-Assembly-constituencies-child- friendly/article16762568.ecehttp://www.politicalmirror.com/68097-2/ He has collaborated with UNICEFhttp://www.thehindu.com/news/national/other- states/Khandapara-to-be-transformed-into-first-child-friendly-Assembly- constituency/article13976090.ece and Kalinga Kusum Foundationhttp://kalingakusum.org/child-friendly-constituency.php in implementing the CFC. He has played an important role in shaping the CFChttp://indiaeducationdiary.in/child-friendly-constituency-kalinga-kusum- capacity-development-khandapada-odisha/ so that no child is left behind in his constituency.https://twitter.com/UNICEFIndia/status/924165785680936960 Due to CFC children in the constituency have been empowered through this initiative and have participated in Gram sabha meetings to raise issues related to child rights, nutrition and welfare.http://www.thehindu.com/news/national/other- states/Children-demand-a-say-in-their-development/article15001481.ece He shared his experience in CFC at the International Association for Adolescent Health (IAAH).https://odishanewsinsight.com/odisha/odisha-mla-anubhav- patanaik-speaks-at-iaah2017/?page_number_0=2 Child-Friendly Constituency is an initiative that allows communities and children within the constituency to proactively engage with their elected representatives and service providers on issues that concern children.http://www.politicalmirror.com/68097-2/ ==Award== Patnaik is the recipient of Aadarsh Yuva Vidhayak Puraskar (Ideal Youth MLA) from Bharatiya Chhatra Sansad.https://www.bharatiyachhatrasansad.org/awards?abkmbsybgr=0&q;=%2Fau- uk%2Fonline-casino-uk-casino-club.php ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Odisha Legislative Assembly
